name: alexa-trenes-argentinos
description: Skill de Alexa para consultar horarios de trenes en Argentina

scripts.predeploy: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.zip: zip -r alexa-trenes-argentinos.zip index.js dist/ node_modules/ apl-documents/ -x "*.git*" "*.DS_Store" "**/node_modules/*/test/*" "**/node_modules/*/tests/*" "**/node_modules/*/docs/*" "**/node_modules/*/examples/*" "**/node_modules/*/coverage/*"
scripts.deploy:legacy: npm run predeploy && pnpm prune --prod && rm -rf alexa-trenes-argentinos.zip && pnpm run zip
